questions.question: Which of the following is a key benefit of using Docker containers in Amazon SageMaker?
options: Containers are tied to a specific instance type.
Containers allow the use of any script or algorithm regardless of runtime or language.
Containers must use SageMaker built-in algorithms only.
Containers cannot be used for inference tasks.
correct_answers: Containers allow the use of any script or algorithm regardless of runtime or language.
questions.Practice test: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer Associate: Hands On!
